pages.text: Wok is a universal, versatile cookware. With help of $(l:utensils/spatula)iron spatula$(), one can conduct many cooking techniques within a wok. Wok must be placed on $(l:utensils/fire_pit)fire pit$(). $(br2)When $(italic)you feel$() it's the time, right click wok with $(l:utensils/plate)empty plate$() to complete cooking and take out the food.
$(em)Right-click$() wok with a spatula to make ingredients be heated evenly.
